Name: Activate Sec Cool Loop
checklistText:
Secondary Coolant Loop (HTS) Activation

	Activation of heat transport section secondary coolant 
	loop assumes either failure of both primary glycol pumps, 
	loss of primary glycol, or inability to maintain primary 
	glycol loop temperature below +50Â°F.

	GLYCOL comp caut lt remains on after secondary coolant 
	loop is activated.

ECS Panel:
1.	WATER TANK SELECT vlv - SEC

Panel 16:
2.	CB ECS:	GLYCOL PUMP SEC - close

Panel 2:
3.	GLYCOL sel - INST (SEC)
	ECS caut lt - off

ECS Panel:
4.	SEC EVAP FLOW vlv - open

Panel 11:
5.	CB ECS:
		GLYCOL PUMP 2 - open
		GLYCOL PUMP 1 - open
		GLYCOL PUMP AUTO TRNFR - open

ECS Panel:
6.	PRI EVAP FLOW #1 vlv - CLOSE
	PRI EVAP FLOW #2 vlv - CLOSE
	ASC H2O vlv - OPEN
	DES H2O vlv - CLOSE

Panel 16:
7.	CB ECS:
		LCG PUMP - open
Panel 11:
		CABIN FAN - open
